CxImage

Version : 7.02
modified : 20160928 / SH Kim / Memory Limit 256MB -> 20GB 

Supported foramt : bmp, jpg, png

Use CxImage32.dll , CxImage32.lib for 32-bit / MBCS Application.
Use CxImage64.dll , CxImage64.lib for 64-bit / MBCS Application.

Use CxImage32u.dll , CxImage32u.lib for 32-bit / Unicode Application.
Use CxImage64u.dll , CxImage64u.lib for 64-bit / Unicode Application.
